name: Bicycle Rider Simulator
description:
Bicycle Rider Simulator - is a relaxing game in which there is only you and your bike, travel through various beautiful locations, enjoy scenery and birdsong.
Exploring a location you can find new transport and go on your next journey already on a new bike. Collect coins and unlock new characters.
The game is designed so that you can forget about your problems and go on a relaxing journey through unexplored forest paths, forget about your daily routine and enjoy a great bike ride.

Features:
  • Various locations to explore;
  • Pleasant visuals;
  • The physics of the bike is close to the simulation of driving a real bike;
  • Relaxing music that immerses you in the atmosphere of nature;
